title: cmd/6g: internal compile error with floating-point variables
body:
by **Vova616**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
File attached.

2. What is the full compiler output?
main.main: doasm: notfound from=34 to=44 (5)	MOVSS	X0,CS

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

6g rev bbb1a6dfcd58
Attachments: 1. main.go (368 bytes)
